param.name: rguid
param.para: Contains a GUID that identifies the compartment that changed.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: When this method is called, the data has changed. The new data can be obtained at this time by calling .
will return E_UNEXPECTED if called from within this notification.

summary.para: The ITfCompartmentEventSink interface is implemented by a client (application or text service) and used by the TSF manager to notify the client when compartment data changes. This notification sink is installed by obtaining an interface from the object and calling with IID_ITfCompartmentEventSink and a pointer to the ITfCompartmentEventSink object.
